      • fromHex

        public static java.awt.Color fromHex(java.lang.String str)
        Return Color object from string. The following formats are allowed: 0xA1B2C3, #abc123, ABC123, ab5, #FFF.
        Parameters:
        str - hex string
        Returns:
        Color object

      • getContrast

        public static double getContrast(java.awt.Color c1,
                                 java.awt.Color c2)
        Contrast ratios can range from 1 to 21 (commonly written 1:1 to 21:1). Text foreground and background colors shall have contrast ration of at least 4.5:1, large-scale text - of at least 3:1.
        See Also:
        W3C contrast ratio definition

      • getLuminance

        public static double getLuminance(java.awt.Color color)
        See Also:
        W3C relative luminance definition

                                 double balance)
